casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1982

(January 5, 1982) State of New York, Respondent, v Carvel Corporation et al., Appellants, et al., Defendant.

Order, Supreme Court, New York County (B. Cohen, J.), entered on or about August 22, 1980, unanimously affirmed, without costs and without disbursements, and without prejudice to a properly circumscribed application for disclosure. No opinion. Concur — Murphy, P. J., Sullivan, Carro, Silverman and Fein, JJ.
